mapper.insert: INSERT INTO manager ( managerID ,managerPW ,managerName ,managerNum ,managerEmail ,managerPostNum ,managerAddr ,managerAddrDetail ) VALUE ( #{userID}, md5(#{managerPW}), #{managerName}, #{managerNum}, #{managerEmail}, #{managerPostNum}, #{managerAddr}, #{managerAddrDetail} )
mapper.select: SELECT managerID as userID, managerPW as userPW FROM manager WHERE managerID = #{userID} AND managerPW = md5(#{userPW})
